google_play_reviews.content: Like the app, but still finding my way around. One thing I notice missing is twitter replies/conversation.... Click on tweet, show conversation... Nothing there???... I know for a fact that there are lots of replies to various tweets, but they are not showing up in this app... Am I missing something?....
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Nick! The Conversation view has "Sync with the Internet" button at the top.
Does it work?
Please follow up here as I visit the reviews section seldom: https://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues?q=is%3Aissue+sort%3Aupdated-desc

google_play_reviews.content: Version 60.01 Fully featured as per app description. This is the twitter app alternative to look into. Works very well with android official roms as well we 3rd party (LOS, graphene, etc). PROS: opensource, free, no ads, no trackers , no permissions requested, compatible with other social networks, light on resources and also available on other app stores. CONS: none found atm.
